name: Just Teach Me
tagline: An amazing app to teach you how to use technology.
body:
### Welcome.
Just Teach Me is an amazing new application to ensure you know how to use all of your technology.
This could range from the basic functions of your smartphone (like calling someone) right through to getting started on some of the most popular apps like Facebook.

### Follow Us
Follow us on Twitter to keep up to date- [@JustTeachMeCo](www.twitter.com/justteachmeco)

### Created at Startup Weekend
This app is being built over 54 hours at the Gold Coast Startup Weekend.

### Contact Us
If you have any questions, Tweet us or [send us an email](mailto:hello@joshuaholmes.id.au).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
